name: 2D Space Shooter Pro (Galaxy Shooter)
description:
@GameDevHQ developed by Zac Bogner 

2D Space Shooter Pro (Galaxy Shooter) Features: 

* The ability to shoot enemies with a projectile 

* The ability to collect Power Ups 

* The ability to provide Thrust to the player controller 

* The ability to add Score for each enemy destroyed 

*  And more features to come soon
